Text:
Might come in handy. Seems like Comcast is blocking TPB or at least playing games with TPB.

Not just going on rumors either, but personal experience and local friends that have Comcast have same problem but friends with FIOS or other have no problems.

it worked perfect for a few days but after it cannot work anymore unless u unistall proxycap, reinstall proxycap , patch and reboot the computer to make it work again. but when u reboot ur comp u have to do the steps over again. unitstall > install > patch > reboot
